translations: 合乎道德地；品性正直地；善良地

sentences.sentence: "I've already done that," said Ronnie virtuously.
sentences.translation: “那事儿我已经做完了，”罗尼自鸣得意地说。

sentences.sentence: Many daughters have done virtuously, but thou excellest them all.
sentences.translation: 说，才德的女子很多，惟独你超过一切。

sentences.sentence: I mean to bring them up virtuously, and they shall be honest, and nice, and believe in God, by the sacred name!
sentences.translation: 我要把她们教育成贞洁的人，她们应当是诚实的，并且应当是温雅的，并且应当信仰天主！信仰这神圣的称号！
